summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Blackjack Trainer with Feature A (Auth/Sync) and Feature B (Coaching). Fixed one critical bug (STORAGE_KEYS export). All 19 backend tests passed, all 11 frontend tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: STORAGE_KEYS was not exported as named export from storage.js, causing syncService.js import to fail
seed_data_creation: Created test user and session for authenticated endpoint testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Auth flow uses Emergent Google Auth (redirect to auth.emergentagent.com). Coaching panel has 20+ drills organized by category. Backend properly returns 401 for unauthenticated requests to protected endpoints.

bug_fixed.issue: STORAGE_KEYS not exported as named export from storage.js
bug_fixed.impact: Frontend was showing compilation error, blocking all functionality
